org.bitcoinj.core.listeners

Class AbstractPeerConnectionEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bitcoinj.core.listeners.AbstractPeerConnectionEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PeerConnectedEventListener, PeerConnectionEventListener, PeerDisconnectedEventListener, PeerDiscoveredEventListener
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractPeerConnectionEventListener
extends Object
implements PeerConnectionEventListener
    Deprecated: implement the more specific event listener interfaces instead to fill out only what you need

    • Method Detail

      • onPeersDiscovered

        public void onPeersDiscovered(Set<PeerAddress> peerAddresses)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: PeerDiscoveredEventListener

        Called when peers are discovered, this happens at startup of PeerGroup or if we run out of suitable Peers to connect to.

        Specified by:
        onPeersDiscovered in interface PeerDiscoveredEventListener
        Parameters:
        peerAddresses - the set of discovered PeerAddresses

      • onPeerConnected

        public void onPeerConnected(Peer peer,
                            int peerCount)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: PeerConnectedEventListener
        Called when a peer is connected. If this listener is registered to a Peer instead of a PeerGroup, peerCount will always be 1.
        Specified by:
        onPeerConnected in interface PeerConnectedEventListener
        peerCount - the total number of connected peers

      • onPeerDisconnected

        public void onPeerDisconnected(Peer peer,
                               int peerCount)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: PeerConnectionEventListener
        Called when a peer is disconnected. Note that this won't be called if the listener is registered on a PeerGroup and the group is in the process of shutting down. If this listener is registered to a Peer instead of a PeerGroup, peerCount will always be 0. This handler can be called without a corresponding invocation of onPeerConnected if the initial connection is never successful.
        Specified by:
        onPeerDisconnected in interface PeerConnectionEventListener
        Specified by:
        onPeerDisconnected in interface PeerDisconnectedEventListener
        peerCount - the total number of connected peers
